text: The 1928 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament took place from February 24–February 28, 1928, at Municipal Auditorium in Atlanta, Georgia. The Mississippi Rebels won their first Southern Conference title, led by head coach Homer Hazel.Southern Conference Tournament Results. p. 6. Retrieved June 29, 2015. ==Bracket== * Overtime game ===Championship=== ==See also== *List of Southern Conference men's basketball champions ==References== Category:1927–28 Southern Conference men's basketball season Category:Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1928 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
